title: Beautifully remodeled DOWNSTAIRS unit of a DUPLEX
posting_body: Beautifully remodeled DOWNSTAIRS unit of a DUPLEX
9532 Greenwood Ave N Unit 2 | Seattle, WA 98103-3076
You don't want to miss this opportunity to live in a beautifully remodeled DOWNSTAIRS unit of a DUPLEX in an incredible location!
Featuring designer finishes, stainless still appliances and a contemporary feel.
Plus you will love the magnificent views of the Cascades from living room as well as bedrooms!
You may never want to leave!
But, when you do, you have all you can think of right outside your door and just steps away.
No smoking and no pets (no exceptions), please.
Keywords: U-district, University District, Seattle, Wallingford, Green lake, Greenwood, Shoreline.
Lots of conveniences within walking distance - minutes to grocery stores - Library - Post Office
5 Minutes Walking to Dry Cleaners - Coffee Shops - Pastry Shops - Wine Shops - Book Shops and much more!!
6 Minute drive to North Seattle Community College
Many restaurannts on the corner of 85th and Greenwood
Metro Route #5 355 (every 10 min) gets you to Seattle downtown - Fremont - Zoo - Shoreline Community College - Northgate
Refinished Vintage Old Growth Fir Floors
